This article will explain 
how
 you can implement this feature for use on your SmartSimple system.
SmartSimple provides Group Email functionality within all levels of the 
UTA
 to permit the mailing of multiple individuals associated with an entity. You can use variables to display information pertinent to the user, organization or UTA level 1, 2 or 3 in the emails. For example, display the first name of the recipient in each email. See 
Variable List
 to learn more about variables. 
Enabling Group Email
You must enable group email before you can use this feature. To enable group email:
 Navigate to the desired UTA.
 Click 
Configuration Settings
.
 Click the 
Security
 tab.
 Click 
Visibility Permissions
.
 Scroll down to 
Enable Group Email
.
 Use the 
Lookup
 to choose the roles you would like to permission. 
 If desired enter 
Logic
, see 
Visibility_Condition
 to learn about constructing conditions for the Logic input.
Using Group Email from within individual UTA record
To send a group email to any contacts associated with a level one from a level one record: 
 Navigate into the desired record in the UTA.
 Click the 
Edit
 button in the action bar (the record must be in edit mode to use group email).
 Click the 
Contacts
 tab.
 Check one or more contacts that you would like to email.
 Click the 
Group Email
 button (will open a modal window to guide you through the process).
 You will see the list of contacts to be emailed, click 
Next
.
 Choose a 
Template
 from the dropdown.
 Add a 
Subject
.
 If you want to save the email as an activity check 
Save as Event
 (see note below).
 Modify the body of your email as desired. 
 Click 
Next
.
 See preview of how the email will look, as well as options to add CC recipients and attachments.
 Click 
Send Message
.
 You will get a notification that the Email was sent successfully and you may close the modal window.
NOTE:
 When checking off 
Save As Event
, if an Email activity has been configured in the UTA the Email will be stored against the record. If no Email activity is configured the Email activity will be saved against the contact profile of all recipients.
Using Group Email from UTA list view
Send an email to contacts in a specific role, associated with a specific UTA level 1, 2 or 3 record:
 Go to the desire UTA and select the desired list view (you can use the search panel to narrow down the list of records).
 Check the desired records.
 Click the 
Group Email
 button in the action bar (you must check a record to see the button).
 Check the Roles you want to send the email to (note if the number of users selected is 0 no one will receive an email).
 Click 
Next
. 
 Choose a 
Template
.
 Enter a 
Subject
.
 Modify the email body as desired.
 Click 
Next
.
 See preview as well as options to add CC recipients and attachments.C
 Click 
Next
.
 The email is sent, you can close the modal window.
Note: Group Email from a UTA list has an option for 
Unique Recipients
. If checked this option will only send one email to each recipient even if they are attached to multiple records. Additionally UTA level 1, 2 and 3 variables will not be processed when this option is checked.
Click 
here
 to learn why this feature is a benefit to your organization.
